    • Method Detail

      • CardDestination

        public static Utilities.MovePoint CardDestination(GameMap map,
                                  BoardLocation startLocation,
                                  Card[] cards)
        Destination for a movement. Ignores all robots on the map but does take into account walls, conveyor belts and gears. Returns the final location of the move.
        Parameters:
        map - The game map.
        startLocation - Where the unit starts.
        cards - The cards to apply.
        Returns:
        The final location of the move.

      • CardPath

        public static Utilities.MovePoint[] CardPath(GameMap map,
                             BoardLocation startLocation,
                             Card[] cards)
        Destination for a movement. Ignores all robots on the map but does take into account walls, conveyor belts and gears. Returns every step of the move.
        Parameters:
        map - The game map.
        startLocation - Where the unit starts.
        cards - The cards to apply.
        Returns:
        Every step of the move.

      • CalcLaserDamage

        public static int CalcLaserDamage(GameMap map,
                  BoardLocation location)
        Calculates what damage a unit will receive from lasers at a given location.
        Parameters:
        map - The game map.
        location - Where the unit is located.
        Returns:
        The amount of damage. Will be 0 or 1.

      • Move

        public static Utilities.MovePoint Move(GameMap map,
                       BoardLocation startLocation,
                       Card.ROBOT_MOVE move)
        Move a unit one card move. Ignores all robots on the map but does take into account walls, conveyor belts and gears.
        Parameters:
        map - The game map.
        startLocation - Where the unit starts.
        move - The move to apply.
        Returns:
        The final location of the move.

      • Move

        public static Utilities.MovePoint Move(GameMap map,
                       java.awt.Point position,
                       MapSquare.DIRECTION direction)
        Move a unit one square in the requested direction. Ignores all robots on the map but does take into account walls, conveyor belts and gears.
        Parameters:
        map - The game map.
        position - The map square to start the move from.
        direction - The direction to move.
        Returns:
        The final location of the move.
